00061 class BBSDirect : public BBSImpl
00062 {
00063 public:
00064     BBSDirect();
00065     virtual ~BBSDirect();
00066 
00067     virtual bool look(const char*);
00068 
00069     virtual void take(const char*); /* blocks til something to take */
00070     virtual bool look_take(const char*); /* returns false if nothing to take */
00071     // after taking use these
00072     virtual int upkint();
00073     virtual double upkdouble();
00074     virtual void upkvec(int, double*);
00075     virtual char* upkstr(); // delete [] char* when finished
00076 
00077     // before posting use these
00078     virtual void pkbegin();
00079     virtual void pkint(int);
00080     virtual void pkdouble(double);
00081     virtual void pkvec(int, double*);
00082     virtual void pkstr(const char*);
00083     virtual void post(const char*);
00084 
00085     virtual void post_todo(int parentid);
00086     virtual void post_result(int id);
00087     virtual int look_take_result(int pid); // returns id, or 0 if nothing
00088     virtual int look_take_todo(); // returns id, or 0 if nothing
00089     virtual int take_todo(); // returns id
00090     virtual void save_args(int);
00091     virtual void return_args(int);
00092 
00093     virtual void context();
00094 
00095     virtual void start();
00096     virtual void done();
00097 
00098     virtual void perror(const char*);
00099     static void check_pvm();
00100 private:
00101     KeepArgs* keepargs_;
00102 
00103     bbsmpibuf* sendbuf_, *recvbuf_;
00104 
00105 };
